 1998-15991998-09-150,  HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1078) which provide for the use of 4-HEXYLRESORCINOL, as a substitute for sulphites, to inhibit the formation of black spot (melanosis) on fresh and frozen crustaceans.
